description:
Brooks shares the story of the final days of the Rumbar pirates and their final song.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bink`s Booze! The Song That Connects the Past with the Present!
Binks no Sake: Kako to Genzai o Tsunagu Uta
Cаке Бинкса – песня, соединяющая прошлое и настоящее
Le bon rhum de Binks. Une chanson qui relie le passé au présent
Tra il presente e il passato
ビンクスの酒 過去と現在をつなぐ唄
